changeSet.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.objects WHERE name = 'DF_Guild_Members_abillity' AND type = 'D') ALTER TABLE Guild_Members DROP CONSTRAINT DF_Guild_Members_abillity IF COL_LENGTH('Guild_Members', 'abillity') IS NULL ALTER TABLE Guild_Members ADD abillity INT IF COL_LENGTH('Guild_Members', 'rank_id') IS NOT NULL ALTER TABLE Guild_Members DROP COLUMN rank_id GO
